chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0%nat
v: Z
u: Z

Goal:
v <= u -> 〘 u 〙 = 〘 v 〙 -> exists i : Z, Z.sub u v = Z.mul i (Z.of_nat p)

Premises:

N.sub = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos n' => match m with | 0%N => n | N.pos m' => match Pos.sub_mask n' m' with | Pos.IsPos p => N.pos p | _ => 0%N end end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.sub (_ _)%N_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.mul (_ _)%N_scope

Z2Zp_mult : forall u v, 〘 u * v 〙 = 〘 u 〙 ⊗ 〘 v 〙
Z2Zp_minus : forall u v, 〘 u - v 〙 = 〘 u 〙 ⊕ ∸ 〘 v 〙
Zp_repr_interval : forall a b u : Z, Z.of_nat p <= b - a -> {v : Z | 〘 u 〙 = 〘 v 〙 /\ a <= v < b}
Z2Zp_repr_canon : forall u, {v : Z | 〘 u 〙 = 〘 v 〙 /\ 0 <= v < Z.of_nat p}
Z2Zp_neg : forall u, u <= 0 -> 〘 u 〙 = ∸ 〘 - u 〙

Z2Zp_pos : forall u, 0 <= u -> 〘 u 〙 = 〚 Z.to_nat u 〛
Z2Zp_opp : forall u, 〘 - u 〙 = ∸ 〘 u 〙
Z_coprime : forall u v : nat, (exists a b : Z, a * Z.of_nat u + b * Z.of_nat v = 1) -> is_gcd u v 1
nat2Zp_minus : forall u v : nat, (v <= u)%nat -> 〚 u - v 〛 = 〚 u 〛 ⊕ ∸ 〚 v 〛
nat2Zp_inj : forall u v : nat, 〚 u 〛 = 〚 v 〛 < -> rem u p = rem v p
nat2Zp_mult : forall u v : nat, 〚 u * v 〛 = 〚 u 〛 ⊗ 〚 v 〛
nat2Zp_plus : forall u v : nat, 〚 u + v 〛 = 〚 u 〛 ⊕ 〚 v 〛
Zp_invertible = fun x => exists i : Z_Zp, i ⊗ x = Op : Z_Zp -> Prop

Z2Zp_zero = eq_ind_r (fun z : Z_Zp => z = Zp) (eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => 〚 n 〛 = Zp) (eq_ind_r (fun z : Z_Zp => z = Zp) eq_refl nat2Zp_zero) Z2Nat.inj_0) (Z2Zp_pos (let Hp0 : Z.of_nat p <> 0 := ZifyClasses.rew_iff (p <> 0%nat) (Z.of_nat p <> 0) (ZifyClasses.not_morph (p = 0%nat) (Z.of_nat p = 0) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z eq Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) p (Z.of_nat p) eq_refl 0%nat 0 eq_refl)) Hp in let cstr : 0 <= Z.of_nat p := Nat2Z.is_nonneg...
Z2Zp = fun u => let s := Z_pos_or_neg u in if s then 〚 Z.to_nat u 〛 else ∸ 〚 Z.to_nat (- u) 〛 : Z -> Z_Zp Arguments Z2Zp _%Z_scope /
Zp_mult_invert : forall x, is_gcd p (proj1_sig x) 1 -> {i : Z_Zp | i ⊗ x = Op}
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = (p * n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope

Zr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list Z) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe2

prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1%nat /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1%nat \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Zp_zero = exist (fun x : nat => (x < p)%nat) 0%nat ((fun lemma : (0 < p)%nat <-> 0 < Z.of_nat p => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (0 < p)%nat (0 < Z.of_nat p) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z lt Z.of_nat Z.lt Nat2Z.inj_lt 0%nat 0 eq_refl p (Z.of_nat p) eq_refl) (let Hp0 : Z.of_nat p <> 0 := ZifyClasses.rew_iff (p <> 0%nat) (Z.of_nat p <> 0) (ZifyClasses.not_morph (p = 0%nat) (Z.of_nat p = 0) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z eq Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) p (Z.of_nat p) eq_refl 0%nat 0 eq_refl...

```coq
unfold Z2Zp, Z2Zp_of_nat in *.
intro Hle; intro H.
apply Zp_repr_interval with (a := 0) (b := u + v) in Hle.
destruct Hle as [v' [Hv' Ha']].
apply Z2Zp_pos in Hv'.
assert (Ha := (Z2Zp_plus _ _)).
rewrite <- Hv' in Ha.
rewrite Z2Zp_plus in Ha.
rewrite <- Ha in Hle.
destruct Hle as [v'' [Hv'' Ha'']].
assert (Ha := (Z2Zp_mult _ _)).
rewrite <- Hv'' in Ha.
rewrite Z2Zp_mult in Ha.
rewrite <- Ha in Hle.
destruct Hle as [i [Hi Ha']].
exists i.
rewrite Hi.
rewrite Z2Zp_mult.
rewrite Z2Zp_plus.
rewrite Z2Zp_of_nat.
reflexivity.
Qed.

original: unfold Z2Zp, Z2Zp_of_nat in *. intro Hle; intro H. apply Zp_repr_interval with (a := 0) (b := u + v) in Hle. destruct Hle as [v' [Hv' Ha']]. apply Z2Zp_pos in Hv'. assert (Ha := (Z2Zp_plus _ _)). rewrite <- Hv' in Ha. rewrite Z2Zp_plus in Ha. rewrite <- Ha in Hle. destruct Hle as [v'' [Hv'' Ha'']]. assert (Ha := (Z2Zp_mult _ _)). rewrite <- Hv'' in Ha. rewrite Z2Zp_mult in Ha. rewrite <- Ha in Hle. destruct Hle as [i [Hi Ha']]. exists i. rewrite Hi. rewrite Z2Zp_mult. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. rewrite Z2Zp_of_nat. reflexivity.
